title: What Gibbsian Statistical Mechanics Says: Defending Bare Probabilism
abstract:
I expound and defend the ``bare probabilism'' reading of Gibbsian (i.e.
mainstream) statistical mechanics, responding to Frigg and Werndl's recent
(BJPS 72 (2021), 105-129) plea: ``can somebody please say what Gibbsian
statistical mechanics says?''
